title: Apples
description: A fruit with a round shape and a red or green skin.

title: Birds
description: Warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrates characterized by feathers and forelimbs modified as wings.

title: Cats
description: A small carnivorous mammal with fur and retractable claws.

title: Dogs
description: A domesticated carnivorous mammal with a distinctive bark and keen sense of smell.

title: Elephants
description: The largest living land animal, characterized by its long trunk and tusks.
